snippet: The structure is not often used by someone whose income comes from writing books, giving talks and doing consulting work.
abstract: The structure is not often used by someone whose income comes from writing books, giving talks and doing consulting work.
lead_paragraph: Our colleague Paul Sullivan has written an interesting piece that looks at the tax implications of Newt Gingrich's having set up his speaker and consulting business as an S corporation:

headline.main: How Newt Gingrich Benefits From His S Corporation
